text:
FOR ANYONE NEEDING AN EFFICENT,USER FRIENDLY,COST EFFECTIVE CELL SERVER TO JAMAICA,LOOK NO FURTHER!!
THIS IS THE ONLY WAY TO GO. I HAVE BEEN USING THIS COMPANY MORE THAT FOUR(4) YEARS NOW, WITH HARDLY AN HITCH.THEIR SITE IS STRAIGHT FORWARD AND EASY TO NAVIGATE.CREDITS ARE IMMEDIATE AND RECEIPTS EASILY PRINTABLE.TRANSACTIONS ARE ALWAYS BACKED UP WITH EMAIL CONFORMATION. SWITCH TO TJ, YOU WONT REGRET IT.
